name: Default policy
messageTemplate:
[ALERT] This is an automated message to inform you that the service _serviceid_ has crashed.
The alert was first generated at _alerttime_. The current escalation level is _escalationlevel_.
You must aknowledge this alarm to inform the system (and your fellow collegues) that the issue is being taken care of. 
Please click on the following link _aknowledgeurl_ to acknowledge.
